text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Zaha Hadid
text.summary: Dame Zaha Mohammad Hadid DBE RA was an award winning Iraqi-British architect known designing the aquatic centre for the London 2012 Olympics, Michigan State University's Broad Art Museum and the Guangzhou Opera House.
